config.before_install: openssl aes-256-cbc -K $encrypted_8d8528292b8b_key -iv $encrypted_8d8528292b8b_iv -in pxscene-build.pem.enc -out /tmp/pxscene-build.pem -d; eval "$(ssh-agent -s)"; chmod 0600 /tmp/pxscene-build.pem; ssh-add /tmp/pxscene-build.pem
config.after_script: ccache -s; tar -cvzf logs.tgz logs/*; ./ci/deploy_files.sh 96.116.56.119 logs.tgz; rm -rf /tmp/pxscene-build.pem
